author: Josh Lederman and Abigail Williams and Dan De Luce
title: U.S. faces unparalleled challenge in evacuating diplomats amid coronavirus
description: The State Department is faced with evacuating American workers from nearly every corner of the globe during a pandemic.
content: WASHINGTON Four days before the U.S. urged all Americans traveling abroad to return immediately, American diplomats got an email informing them that anyone serving in a country deemed a Level 3 or higher health risk by the CDC could ask to cut short their tou… [+7019 chars]
